rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I feel so pathetic... Back on Gula,
I used to harvest my own food, but
now it's just handed out to me.

rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I fled to Acedia to escape Superbia...
but Acedia is the cause of this war in
the first place.

rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Just think about it. This is where all of
Superbia's Blades are managed.

rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If they don't want war, they shouldn't
be sending out Blades at all. They're
like some kind of arms dealer...
